title: Enacts the "food retail establishment subsidization for healthy communities act"
summary: Enacts the "food retail establishment subsidization for healthy communities act" (FRESH Communities); provides loans, loan guarantees, interest subsidies and grants to businesses, municipalities, not-for-profit corporations or local development corporations for the purpose of attracting, maintaining or permitting the expansion of food retail establishments in underserved areas; establishes the retail food establishment living wages tax credit.
lawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
actClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to enacting the food retail establishment subsidization for healthy communities (FRESH Communities) act; and to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing the retail food establishment living wages tax credit
